titleStmt.title: 'bum dang nyi khri lnga stong pa dang khri brgyad stong pa gsum don mthun par mngon rtogs brgyad du bstan pa/
Śata­sāhasrikā­pañca­viṃśati­sāhasrikāṣṭā­daśa­sāhasrikā­trayasamānārthāṣṭābhisamaya­śāsana

A Teaching on the Concordance of the Eight Stages of Clear Realization with the Content of the Three Sūtras of the Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand, Twenty-Five Thousand, and Eighteen Thousand Lines
Prajñā­pāramitāmātṛkā­śata­sāhasrikābṛhacchāsana­pañca­viṃśati­sāhasrikā­madhya­śāsanāṣṭā­daśa­sāhasrikā­laghu­śāsanāṣṭa­samānārtha­śāsana
[author] Smṛtijñānakīrti
don brgyad kyis mthun par bstan pa/
Aṣṭasamānārthaśasana

The Common Points of the Eight Stages with the Long Transcendent Perfection of Wisdom Mother Scripture in One Hundred Thousand Lines, the Medium Scripture in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines, and the Short Scripture in Eighteen Thousand Lines
